alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Northeast Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...STRONG DRY MICROBURST WINDS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN SAN MIGUEL, SOUTHEASTERN SANDOVAL, SOUTHERN SANTA FE, BERNALILLO AND NORTHERN TORRANCE COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM MDT... At 657 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong microburst winds around the East Mountains and Estancia Basin, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edgewood, Moriarty, Estancia, Tijeras, Willard, Encino, Cerrillos Hills State Park, Cedar Grove, Chilili and McIntosh. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 175 and 239. Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 314 and 333. Highway 285 between Mile Markers 223 and 281. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 215 and 218, and between Mile Markers 226 and 260. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Blowing dust associated with strong microburst winds can reduce visibilities below one quarter mile at times.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Northeast Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area
